chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
llvwli: leaderLogs_votesWithLog_interface
vci: votes_correct_interface
cci: cronies_correct_interface
vvci: votes_votesWithLog_correspond_interface
lltsi: leaderLogs_term_sanity_interface

Goal:
forall q1 q2 : list name, NoDup q1 -> NoDup q2 -> length q1 > div2 (length nodes) -> length q2 > div2 (length nodes) -> exists v : name, In v q1 /\ In v q2

Premises:
NoDup : forall A : Type, list A -> Prop
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Record cronies_correct_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_cronies_correct_interface { cronies_correct_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> cronies_correct net } Arguments cronies_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_cronies_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record votes_votesWithLog_correspond_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_votes_votesWithLog_correspond_interface { votes_votesWithLog_correspond_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> votes_votesWithLog_correspond net } Arguments votes_votesWithLog_correspond_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_votes_votesWithLog_correspond_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Record votes_correct_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_votes_correct_interface { votes_correct_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> votes_correct net } Arguments votes_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_votes_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record raft_refinement_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_raft_refinement_interface { refined_raft_net_invariant : forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), refined_raft_net_invariant_init P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset P -> refined_raft_net_invariant
Record leaderLogs_term_sanity_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_leaderLogs_term_sanity_interface { leaderLogs_term_sanity_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leaderLogs_term_sanity net; leaderLogs_currentTerm_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leaderLogs_currentTerm_sanity net; leaderLogs_currentTerm_sanity_candidate_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leaderLogs_currentTerm_sanity_candidate net } Arguments leaderLogs_term_sanity_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_leaderLogs_term_sanity_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
length : forall A : Type, list A -> nat
div2 = fix div2 (a : nat) : nat := match a with | S (S n) => S (div2 n) | _ => 0 end : nat -> nat Arguments div2 _%nat_scope
Record leaderLogs_votesWithLog_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_leaderLogs_votesWithLog_interface { leaderLogs_votesWithLog_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leaderLogs_votesWithLog net } Arguments leaderLogs_votesWithLog_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_leaderLogs_votesWithLog_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
nodes = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => all_fin N : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list name Arguments nodes {orig_base_params raft_params}
wonElection_dedup_spec : forall l : list name, wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec l) = true -> exists quorum : list name, NoDup quorum /\ length quorum > div2 (length nodes) /\ (forall h : name, In h quorum -> In h l)
wonElection_length : forall votes : list name, wonElection votes = true -> length votes > div2 (length nodes)
leaderLogs_votesWithLog = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (t : term) (ll : list entry) (leader : Net.name), In (t, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net leader))) ->...-> Prop Arguments leaderLogs_votesWithLog {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
pigeon : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall l sub1 sub2 : list A, (forall a : A, In a sub1 -> In a l) -> (forall a : A, In a sub2 -> In a l) -> NoDup l -> NoDup sub1 -> NoDup sub2 -> length sub1 + length sub2 > length l -> exists a : A, In a sub1 /\ In a sub2
haveQuorum = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (state : raft_data) (_ : name) (N : logIndex) => div2 (length nodes) <? length (filter (fun h : name => N <=? assoc_default name_eq_dec (matchIndex state) h 0) nodes) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), raft_data -> name -> logIndex -> bool Arguments haveQuorum {orig_base_params raft_params}
handleRequestVoteReply_spec : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h' : name) (t : nat) (r : bool) (st' : raft_data), st' = handleRequestVoteReply h st h' t r -> log st' = log st /\ (forall v : name, In v (votesReceived st) -> In v (votesReceived st')) /\ (currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ type st' = type st \/ type st' <> Candidate) /\ (type st <> Leader /\ type st' = Leader -> type st = Candidate /\ wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec (votesReceived st')) = true)
handleRequestVoteReply_spec' : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h' : name) (t : nat) (r : bool) (st' : raft_data), st' = handleRequestVoteReply h st h' t r -> log st' = log st /\ (forall v : name, In v (votesReceived st) -> In v (votesReceived st')) /\ (type st <> Leader /\ type st' = Leader -> (type st = Candidate /\ wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec (votesReceived st')) = true) /\ r = true /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ currentTerm st = t /\ votesReceived st' = h' :: votesReceived st)
div2_correct : forall c a b : nat, a > div2 c -> b > div2 c -> a + b > c
subset_length : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall xs ys : list A, NoDup xs -> (forall x : A, In x xs -> In x ys) -> length ys >= length xs
wonElection_no_dup_in : forall l1 l2 : list name, wonElection l1 = true -> NoDup l1 -> (forall x : name, In x l1 -> In x l2) -> wonElection l2 = true
wonElection_one_in_common : forall l l' : list name, wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec l) = true -> wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec l') = true -> exists h : name, In h l /\ In h l'
refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (t : nat) (v : bool), handleRequestVoteReply (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) (pSrc p) t v = d -> gd = update_elections_data_requestVoteReply (pDst p) (pSrc p) t v (nwState net (pDst p)) -> pBody p = RequestVoteReply t v -> P net ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
CommonTheorems.wonElection_length : forall l1 l2 : list name, wonElection l1 = true -> length l1 <= length l2 -> wonElection l2 = true
wonElection_exists_voter : forall l : list name, wonElection l = true -> exists x : name, In x l
refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (t : nat) (v : bool), handleRequestVoteReply (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) (pSrc p) t v = d -> gd = update_elections_data_requestVoteReply (pDst p) (pSrc p) t v (nwState net (pDst p)) -> pBody p = RequestVoteReply t v -> P net ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
wonElection = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (votes : list name) => S (div2 (length nodes)) <=? length votes : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list name -> bool Arguments wonElection {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
remove_length_ge : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x : A) (xs : list A), NoDup xs -> length (remove A_eq_dec x xs) >= length xs - 1
update_eq : forall (A B : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (sigma : A -> B) (x y : A) (v : B), x = y -> update A_eq_dec sigma x v y = v
remove_length_not_in : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x : A) (xs : list A), ~ In x xs -> length (remove A_eq_dec x xs) = length xs
refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : ghost_data) (d : raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), doLeader d h = (os, d', ms) -> P net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwState net h = (gd, d) -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (gd, d') h') ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
refined_raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : ghost_data) (d : raft_data) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (h : name), doGenericServer h d = (os, d', ms) -> P net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwState net h = (gd, d) -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (gd, d') h') ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (h : name) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleTimeout h (snd (nwState net h)) = (out, d, l) -> gd = update_elections_data_timeout h (nwState net h) -> P net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (gd, d) h') ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
update_diff : forall (A B : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (sigma : A -> B) (x : A) (v : B) (y : A), x <> y -> update A_eq_dec sigma x v y = sigma y
refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (h : name) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input), handleClientRequest h (snd (nwState net h)) client id c = (out, d, l) -> gd = update_elections_data_client_request h (nwState net h) client id c -> P net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
remove_NoDup : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x : A) (xs : list A), NoDup xs -> NoDup (remove A_eq_dec x xs)
refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : ghost_data) (d : raft_data) (m : list (name * msg)) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (res : bool), handleAppendEntriesReply (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) (pSrc p) t es res = (d, m) -> gd = fst (nwState net (pDst p)) -> pBody p = AppendEntriesReply t es res -> P net ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
candidateEntries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (e : entry) (sigma : name -> electionsData * RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) => exists h : name, wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec (cronies (fst (sigma h)) (eTerm e))) = true /\ (currentTerm (snd (sigma h)) = eTerm e -> type (snd (sigma h)) <> Candidate) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), entry -> (name -> electionsData * RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) -> Prop Arguments candidateEntries {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%function_scope
plus_gt_0 : forall a b : nat, a + b > 0 -> a > 0 \/ b > 0
OMEGA7 : forall x y z t : Z, (z > 0)%Z -> (t > 0)%Z -> (0 <= x)%Z -> (0 <= y)%Z -> (0 <= x * z + y * t)%Z
Inductive raft_intermediate_reachable (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : network -> Prop := RIR_init : raft_intermediate_reachable step_async_init | RIR_step_failure : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> raft_intermediate_reachable net' | RIR_handleInput : forall (net : network) (h : name) (inp : raft_input) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (ps' : list packet) (st' : name -> data), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> handleInput h inp (nwState net h) = (out, d...
inj_gt : forall n m : nat, n > m -> (Z.of_nat n > Z.of_nat m)%Z
update_fun_comm : forall (A B C : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (f : B -> C) (st : A -> B) (y : A) (v : B) (x : A), f (update A_eq_dec st y v x) = update A_eq_dec (fun x0 : A => f (st x0)) y (f v) x

Inductive refined_raft_intermediate_reachable (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : network -> Prop := RRIR_init : refined_raft_intermediate_reachable step_async_init | RRIR_step_failure : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net' | RRIR_handleInput : forall (net : network) (h : name) (inp : raft_input) (gd : electionsData) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (ps' : list packet) (st' : name -> data), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net...
update : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (?A -> ?B) -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?B where ?A : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface llvwli : leaderLogs_votesWithLog_interface vci : votes_correct_interface cci : cronies_correct_interface vvci : votes_votesWithLog_correspond_interface lltsi : leaderLogs_term_sanity_interface |- Type] ?B : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface llvwli : leaderLogs_votesWithLog_interface vci : votes_correct_interface cci : cronies_correct_interface vvci : votes_votesWithLog_correspond_interface lltsi : leaderLogs_term_sanity_interface |- Type]
leaderLogs_term_sanity = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (t : term) (log : list entry) (e : entry), In (t, log) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) -> In e log -> eTerm e < t : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments leaderLogs_term_sanity {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
refined_raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : ghost_data) (d : raft_data) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (h : name), doGenericServer h d = (os, d', ms) -> P net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |} -> nwState net h = (gd, d) ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : ghost_data) (d : raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), doLeader d h = (os, d', ms) -> P net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |} -> nwState net h = (gd, d) ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (h : name) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleTimeout h (snd (nwState net h)) = (out, d, l) -> gd = update_elections_data_timeout h (nwState net h) -> P net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |} ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : nat) (cid : name) (lli llt : nat), handleRequestVote (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) t (pSrc p) lli llt = (d, m) ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope

```coq
intros q1 q2 H1 H2 H3 H4.
unfold gt in H3, H4.
apply plus_gt_0 in H3 as H5.
apply plus_gt_0 in H4 as H6.
apply pigeon with (l:=nodes orig_base_params raft_params) in H5 as [v [H7 H8]]; auto.
apply pigeon with (l:=nodes orig_base_params raft_params) in H6 as [u [H9 H10]]; auto.
exists v.
split; auto.
apply remove_NoDup in H1.
apply remove_NoDup in H2.
apply remove_length_ge in H1.
apply remove_length_ge in H2.
apply remove_length_not_in in H1.
apply remove_length_not_in in H2.
apply inj_gt in H1.
apply inj_gt in H2.
apply subset_length in H1; auto.
apply subset_length in H2; auto.
split; auto.
```

original: intros q1 q2 H1 H2 H3 H4. unfold gt in H3, H4. apply plus_gt_0 in H3 as H5. apply plus_gt_0 in H4 as H6. apply pigeon with (l:=nodes orig_base_params raft_params) in H5 as [v [H7 H8]]; auto. apply pigeon with (l:=nodes orig_base_params raft_params) in H6 as [u [H9 H10]]; auto. exists v. split; auto. apply remove_NoDup in H1. apply remove_NoDup in H2. apply remove_length_ge in H1. apply remove_length_ge in H2. apply remove_length_not_in in H1. apply remove_length_not_in in H2. apply inj_gt in H1. apply inj_gt in H2. apply subset_length in H1; auto. apply subset_length in H2; auto. split; auto.
